front.title: We value your privacy
front.description: {{company}} uses cookies and technologies such as Google Analytics to count, track and analyze visits. This helps us to improve your experience on this website. Click below to consent to use these technologies. You can change your consent choices any time by clicking on 'Change Consent' in the footer.

options.title: We value your privacy
options.description: You can change the settings below to determine how you want your data to be used. Each purpose describes how we and our partners use your data.

Project.title: Contribute as a private server project
Project.description: LegacyPlayers v3 makes private server projects first class data providers. Using LP's RestAPI a private key, armory and raid data can be inserted, modified and deleted. This way you are in full control of the data you provide through LegacyPlayers. If you don't want to bother coding your own exporter, you can use LP's open-source exporter which is easy to configure and provides you with a number of features:

advantages.0: 0. Your players have fine grained control about their data on LegacyPlayers: give/withdraw consent, modifying/deleting data and choose in a fine grained way which data is uploaded.
advantages.1: 1. The exporter is a configurable docker container that updates and prolongs it access token by itself.
advantages.2: 2. It is completely open-source. You can 100% trust that the application is not malicious.
advantages.3: 3. The consent manager enables you to comply with the GDPR.

Project.whyLp: Using LegacyPlayers your players can have easy and detailed access to an armory, pve and pvp logs. This will improve the quality of your service significantly.

advantages2.1: 1. Keep the data up to date, delete or modify it.
advantages2.2: 2. Maintain a history of your player's character's developments.
advantages2.3: 3. Provide more detailed data that is otherwise not accessible through player uploads.
advantages2.4: 4. Use LPs armory, PvP and PvE log viewer as a service by your server for your player.
advantages2.5: 5. Player use a familiar interface and can access their player data from anywhere.

Project.disadvantages: There are really no disadvantages in this deal. If you choose to provide the data directly then you are in full control of it. If you don't players can freely upload any data from your server to the site, regardless of validity. This has worked well in the past, but it has its obvious flaws. So take the leashes in your own hands instead.
Project.contact: If you are interested please contact Shino#3990 on Discord! (Links are in the footer)

Individual.title: Contribute as individual
Individual.description: Currently it is not possible to upload logs as individual. This feature is planned for mid/end of may.
Individual.description2: Please contact your server's admins and urge them to contribute directly instead.
